title: Muditha Peiris: New Chairman of Litro Gas
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Muditha Peiris was appointed as the new chairman of Litro gas on Monday (13).
The New Chairman of Litro Gas will assume duties from Wednesday (13).
He was appointed as the Chairman of Litro Gas following the resignation of Eng. Vijitha Herath.
